title: Sacco and Vanzetti (play)
text:
Sacco and Vanzetti () is a 1960 play by and <a href="Luciano%20Vincenzoni">Luciano Vincenzoni</a> about the <a href="Sacco%20and%20Vanzetti">Sacco and Vanzetti</a> case.
Development.
 and <a href="Luciano%20Vincenzoni">Luciano Vincenzoni</a> wrote the chronicle play in 1960. Following its successful Italian production in Rome's Paroli Theater, the play traveled to Germany, France, Great Britain, and Latin America. A musical version of the play, "<a href="The%20Shoemaker%20and%20the%20Peddler">The Shoemaker and the Peddler</a>", played <a href="off-Broadway">off-Broadway</a> in New York.
Following its French translation by César Gattegno and Eli Marinelli, Raymond Gerbal staged the production with the Franc Théâtre in Paris's <a href="Th%C3%A9%C3%A2tre%20R%C3%A9camier">Théâtre Récamier</a> in April 1964. Later productions moved to the suburbs.
